message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,400,000.  It's a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I am able to offer $1,350,000 for the product. I hope this aligns with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $1,350,000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $1,380,000. This would still be a great deal for you, considering the value of the product. Let's see if we can find common ground here.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I am able to offer $1,365,000. I hope this proposal works for you.
